title: New free champion rotation: Jhin, Karma, Taric and more!

replies.body:
#A Corporate Matter
**Episode: _We Don't Know What We Want, Only The Corporates Do_**

{{champion:150}} "So, why was a dreaded space pirate running the space prison anyways? Shouldn't he be locked up in it."

{{champion:3}} "Oh, he decided to go legit. And he actually got elected as warden. You never know who people are going to vote for. Rumor is that he is going to run for governor next."

{{champion:43}} **"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!"**

{{champion:154}} **"WHY IS THERE SCREAMING! IS IT TIME TO KILL?"**

{{champion:43}} **"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!"**

{{champion:3}} "Ma'am, please calm down. I know that we are a bunch of escaped criminals and you are just a lunch lady. But there is no need to-"

{{champion:43}} **"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"**

{{champion:150}} **"DID YOU GUYS SERIOUSLY NOT CHECK TO SEE IF ANYONE WAS ON THE LUNCH BUS BEFORE YOU HIJACKED IT, WHAT THE HELL! NOW WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO WITH HER?"**

{{champion:64}} **"DON'T WORRY, I HAVE A PLAN!"**
_"Pushes airlock button."_

{{champion:43}} "**AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH**HHHHHHHHHHhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh-"
_"Flies out into the deep void of space."_

{{champion:57}} "I am Maokai!"

{{champion:150}} "Yeah, okay. That works."

_**A few minutes later:**_

_**"Bonk"**_

{{champion:64}} "Did you guys here that?"

{{champion:113}} "Sounds like it came from the roof."

{{champion:266}} "You bet it did! I've come to kill you, Corporate Lee Sin!"

{{champion:150}} "Aatrox? how did you get in here?"

{{champion:266}} "You guys left the airlock open."

{{champion:3}} "Wait, that doesn't make any sense. If we left it open, none of us would be able to speak. We also would have been sucked out into space. If we didn't just die from freezing or lack of oxygen first."

{{champion:266}} **"THERE ISN'T EVEN SPACESHIPS IN LEAGUE LORE. DREADNOVA GANGPLANK ONLY EXISTS IN SOME ALTERNATE UNIVERSE. SO SPACE CAN ACT HOWEVER IT WANTS!"**

{{champion:64}} "So, why are you here to kill me again?"

{{champion:266}} "JUST LOOK AT ME! I'm worthless now. You made me rework so very complicated and underpowered. And you are going to pay with your life."

{{champion:64}} "Look man, you are the one that forced me to give you a rework. I only had like five minutes, I don't know what you were expecting. I just wanted your sword."

{{champion:266}} "Speaking of which, where is my sword? I kinda need it back, to kill you."

{{champion:64}} "I threw it back into the prison."

_**Meanwhile:**_

{{champion:48}} "Hey, look at me! I'm Nightmare, I found the soul edge. **BOW BEFORE MY POWER!**"

_**Back on the lunch space bus:**_

{{champion:266}} "What, really? Awww man, I don't want to go all the way back. What did you need it for anyways?"

{{champion:64}} "Nothing turns out. Galio was just being a jerk."

{{champion:266}} "Wait, you ruined me and took my sword, **FOR A PRANK, BRO!** Nevermind, I can kill you without it. Let me just take this cooking knife here. **DIE DIE DIE!**"
_"Begins using every part of his kit to kill Corporate Lee Sin."_

{{champion:64}} _"Yawn."_

{{champion:266}} **"WHY! AREN'T! YOU! DYING!"**

{{champion:64}} "Because I have no idea how to properly balance a diver. Anyways, I'm getting bored. How about a 200% AD scaling kick?"
_"One-shots Aatrox."_

{{champion:266}} "Why didn't I, revive?"
_"Dies."_

{{champion:3}} "Now that that's over with. Let's get back to Runeterra."

{{champion:150}} "Finally away from that psychopath, Dreadnova Gangplank. All so I can go back to working for an even worse psychopath. I wonder what he has been up to lately."

_**Meanwhile:**_

{{champion:50}} "Alright, it's finally time!"

{{champion:36}} "Huh, who be you?"

{{champion:81}} "That's Dragon Master Swain sir. You agreed to have a meeting with him."

{{champion:36}} "Dragon Master who? Eh, Corporate Mundo no think it matter. What you have say?"

{{champion:50}} "You are adding Dragon Slayer Xin Zhao to the game. So now there are five Dragon Slayers and not many dragons other than Shyvana. And she isn't popular anymore."

{{champion:36}} "Corporate Mundo wonder when we get to point."

{{champion:50}} "They need something to fight. Someone who can control and summon Dragons. Is part dragon and is ability power. Since the Dragon slayers are all AD. Someone who hasn't gotten a skin in years."

{{champion:36}} "Me think maybe you right. Corporate Mundo make call, have perfect target in mind."

**_"Ring Ring"_**

{{champion:90}} "Yellow."

{{champion:36}} "Art Master Malzahar. Remember skin you want in game but me say no?"

{{champion:90}} "Oh yeah, Blood Moon Zed?"

{{champion:36}} "No no no, other one."

{{champion:90}} "Forsaken Fiora?"

{{champion:36}} "No, scary purple one with wings."

{{champion:90}} "Ah yes, Dragon Sorceress Zyra. What about her?"

{{champion:36}} "Bring her to office. Corporate Mundo add her to game now."

{{champion:90}} "Alright, I'll be right over. By the way, any idea what color a pug is supposed to be?"

{{champion:36}} "Me no know. Corporate Mundo no like wrinkles, no make play things out of Puggle."
_"Hangs up."_

{{champion:36}} "Dragon Master someone, you give great idea. League thank you for it. Now go, it Corporate Mundo nap time."

{{champion:50}} _"Stares at 20 story drop out the window."_ " No, don't do it, there is still hope. It is inevitable that there will be a swain vgu. Then they will have to add me."
_"Walks out the building."_

{{champion:3}} "You never who people are going to vote for"
I assume you meant know?
Yes, yes I did.

OK
BTW good job

**Beyond the Void: Season 2 - Episode 11** 

_Have we forgotten about Soraka? Oh dear, she is such a vital part to this story. After all, we must have our share of females in this story or the sexism claims will shut down our offices! Last time we saw her (Season 2/Episode 8), she was seen with Ekko and she had started her journey to Sector 19. This is where the time flask was located. However, she fell in love with Ekko after a day of traveling with him. Ekko had never been loved before and he had certainly never seen a girl more intriguing. So, they committed adultery a few times a day for the next week or so..._ 

{{champion:245}} _waking up_ "Oh man... the sky is so.. bright!"

_Ekko looks to the left of where he had slept. Soraka is not there._ 

{{champion:16}} _appearing out of a bush_ "Hey there, baby. Good morning!"

{{champion:245}} _rubbing his forehead_ "What the hell happened...?" 

_He looks a little south of the equator and sees no pants._ 

{{champion:245}} _freaking out_ "OH MY GOSH. OH F**K. WHAT THE HELL AM I SUPPOSED TO DO NOW?!"

{{champion:16}} "Did you just do it with me without even knowing that you were doing it?"

{{champion:245}} "No, no, no, NO! You do NOT understand! I just committed adultery!"

{{champion:16}} "You're just realizing this? By the way, I don't have feelings for you. I'm just using you to escape this crappy life on this stupid island."

{{champion:245}} _suddenly backing up_ "Holy s**t! This would be my ninth time committing the same crime! AHH!"

{{champion:16}} "Annnnd, this is where I leave you alone.... forever." 

{{champion:245}} _moving forward suddenly_ "What are you talking about?"

_Ekko's expression changes and looks like a completely different person. Soraka, who has now dealt with these kinds of people, realizes that he is suffering from the multiple personality disorder._ 

{{champion:16}} "Fascinating! It seems as if you cannot survive without this time flask. We have to hurry. I don't think you can live for much longer without it." 

_Soraka gathers her belongings and helps Ekko up. They both start to walk towards the destination at a decent pace. Soraka grabs Ekko's hand and starts to lead him in the right direction. However, Ekko keeps getting distracted by environment around him. He then lets go of Soraka and backs away, reaching for his timewinder._ 

{{champion:245}} _disgruntled_ "I hate you so much. How dare you.... you... grab my hand and force me around. I have had enough of this... this... BULLS**T!"

_Ekko phase dives toward Soraka and lifts his timewinder up inorder to smack her down with it. However, Soraka swings out her staff with really fast reflexes and blocks his move. They both continue to struggle as one tries to input more force on the collision to knock the other off balance._ 

{{champion:16}} "Nice try, Ekko: B**ch Edition. I've trained for much longer than you have." 

_Soraka smirks and then slides out in between Ekko's legs. She then charges  towards Ekko._ 

Meanwhile on the battlefield...

{{champion:122}} _killing a nearby soldier_ "ARRGH!"

_Darius stabs the void soldier with his axe and then rips the axe out, causing blood to splurge everywhere. Before moving on to the next soldier, Darius looks at the sky and sniffs twice._ 

{{champion:122}} "Strange. That can't be right... Hey! We need to get out of here like RIGHT NOW!"

_Everyone started moving away from the void ship as they performed their last kills. Then together, they started to run away from the ship to take cover._ 

{{champion:90}} "Huh? Why is everyone running? Have we really won the battle?"

_He looks around._

{{champion:90}} "No. That's not it."

_A loud sound can be heard as bomber planes circle the void ship in the sky._

{{champion:90}} "Ah. That's why..... OH F**K! THAT'S WHY!"

_Before Malzahar could move, the bomber planes dropped tons and tons of bombs at the ship. The explosions rang throughout the island. The big impacts had started mini fires all along the circumference of the impact. Darius looked behind as he ran. He saw the big orange plumes of fire and he could feel the heat of the blasts._ 

{{champion:122}} _panting_ "Keep running! Don't stop until you find the river that splits down this island!"

You used the word "Splurge"
I do not think it means what you think it means.

Sorry! This was a mistake I forgot to correct. I do know what splurge means. I meant to put "splurt", but it got autocorrected to "splurge" - - which means to spend money freely (and that doesn't make any sense within the context of the story).
OK

Look, I love this series. But it wasn't an Aatrox rework. It was a stop gap, an experimentation, if you will. And, if I may, you keep misusing comas.

But you're doing an amazing job regardless.
That ending was perfect, haven't laughed like that all day
hey they got this down 2 adc, 2 junglers, 2 mid laners , and 2 sup, and 2 top laners
8 of the 10 champions can be played toplane

"Can be played" is not the same as "should be played" .

Also, they shoot for at least 2 options for each lane. Most champions can be played in more than one lane. Meaning you'll often have more than 2 free options for whatever lane you're in.

Jhin is fourth on the list. I approve.
Now this weekend we can have one FOUR all gamemodes. :)
